mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquery (member_id, subject, inquery_content, status, inquery_admin, hide) VALUE(#{member_id}, #{subject}, #{inquery_content}, '미처리', '배정중' ,0)
mapper.select: select member_id, subject, DATE_FORMAT(inquery_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as inquery_date, inquery_content ,status, inquery_admin, hide from inquery where inquery_idx=#{param1}
mapper.update: UPDATE inquery SET hide = 1 WHERE inquery_idx = #{param1} AND status='미처리'
